title: Add SQLServer Revoke statement
body:
For #6478 

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- I've proofread the SQLServer [REVOKE](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/t-sql/statements/revoke-transact-sql?view=sql-server-ver15) statement and added test cases.
- I've added `grantClassPrivileges`, `grantOnClassClause`, `grantClassTypePrivileges`, and `grantOnClassTypeClause` rules in the `revoke` rule as they are same by definition. After proofreading `deny`, I'll rename them to generic names.

title: Update contribution doc
body:
Purpose:
- Improve contribution document for new contributors. We're collaborating on OpenForce 2022 these days, there're much similar build questions.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- Update code conduct doc. 1) Explain Maven build process, simply compare `mvn` and `./mvnw`, 2) Move Checkstyle configuration in `establish-project` doc, since it's already done in `mvn install`.
- Sync doc to CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md. 1) Just keep it the same as `code-conduct.en.md`.
- Update contribute index doc. 1) Put `Environment Set Up Guide` at the beginning of doc, since it should be done at first.
- Update establish-project doc. 1) Rewrite most of the `Environment Set Up Guide`, add more categories, and remove how to install JDK and clone code.
- Update contributor doc. 1) Add how to prevent from compile error of parser in IDE

title: Improve the base version of H2Database's JDBC driver to 2.X.
body:
Fixes #15327 .

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- Improve the base version of H2Database's JDBC driver to 2.X.
- Using the JDBC driver of H2Database 1.X to access the server of H2Database 2.X will cause SQL execution failure. Therefore, the version is improved. See https://github.com/h2database/h2database/issues/2180 .
- Verify and fixes #14617 .

title: Restart TransactionContext when alter transaction rule in narayana xa mode
body:
ref #15405 .

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- Change to `for` from `stream` in fun `findRuleConfiguration`
- Restart transaction context after change transaction config

### Test 

- [x] `Memory`,`Standalone`: start a proxy, then use `distsql` to change transaction config, proxy will restart `TransactionContext`
- [x] `Cluster`: no  transaction props, there are `resource`, start proxy, proxy use the first resource as the address for store transaction log, then use `distsql` to change transaction config, proxy will restart `TransactionContext`

title: Add StatementManager and cache statements for ShardingSpherePreparedStatement
body:
Fixes #15936.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- add StatementManager and cache statements for ShardingSpherePreparedStatement
- update unit test

Performance test result for encrypt point select:

```
MySQL Connector/J 8.0.27

Benchmark                                                                         Mode  Cnt      Score     Error  Units
EmptyEncryptAlgorithmPointSelectBenchmark.oltpPointSelectWithRawJDBC             thrpt   10  31482.249  325.717  ops/s
EmptyEncryptAlgorithmPointSelectBenchmark.oltpPointSelectWithShardingSphereJDBC  thrpt   10  28433.281  445.749  ops/s

(31482.249 - 28433.281) / 31482.249 = 0.09684721

MySQL Connector/J 5.1.47

Benchmark                                                                         Mode  Cnt      Score     Error  Units
EmptyEncryptAlgorithmPointSelectBenchmark.oltpPointSelectWithRawJDBC             thrpt   10  33060.549  488.330  ops/s
EmptyEncryptAlgorithmPointSelectBenchmark.oltpPointSelectWithShardingSphereJDBC  thrpt   10  32294.347  181.547  ops/s

(33060.549 - 32294.347) / 33060.549 = 0.02317572
```
